{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LG |model=LW1100AP |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/29/2001 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Acrowave Systems |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=FFMLW1100AP |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=console port (DE-9) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841;HFA3841CN, 0026S 4274440, LUC 1257H; |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861A |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Level One |eth_chip2_model=LXT905LC |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=150mA Low-Noise LDO Regulator;Micrel;MIC5206;;1; |flags=block diagram |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=100.100.100.100 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:04:47 |oui_eth=00:04:47 }} {{TagLine|11Mbps Wireless Access Point}}
"LG Goldstream" and "LW1100AP Rev. 1.0" is silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos.
This is presumed to be an '''Acrowave''' manufactured device.
The antenna connector may be a reverse-threaded SMA type / variant.
